desc: After facing Lucius, the Summoner receives a request from Elder Grahdens.He wants the Summoner to defeat the Demon Mashreed as a training exercise. However, Mashreed is not the only demon in the area, as there are many others in the mix.Grahdens is ready to wipe the floor with these demons, but it seems he has some particular expectations in mind.
name: The Old Dawn General
